member.name: T:isRock.LineBot.Bot
member.summary: 操作Line bot的類別實體(quota/delivery/Insight部分)

member.name: M:isRock.LineBot.Bot.GetTheTargetLimitForAdditionalMessages
member.summary: Gets the target limit for additional messages in the current month.

member.name: M:isRock.LineBot.Bot.GetNumberOfMessagesSentThisMonth
member.summary: Gets the number of messages sent in the current month.

member.name: M:isRock.LineBot.Bot.GetNumberOfSentReplyMessages(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the number of messages sent with the /bot/message/reply endpoint. The number of messages retrieved by this operation does not include the number of messages sent from LINE Official Account Manager.

member.name: M:isRock.LineBot.Bot.GetNumberOfSentPushMessages(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the number of messages sent with the /bot/message/push endpoint. The number of messages retrieved by this operation does not include the number of messages sent from LINE Official Account Manager. Note: LINE@ accounts under the free or basic plan cannot call this API endpoint.

member.name: M:isRock.LineBot.Bot.GetNumberOfSentMulticastMessages(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the number of messages sent with the /bot/message/multicast endpoint. The number of messages retrieved by this operation does not include the number of messages sent from LINE Official Account Manager. Note: LINE@ accounts under the free or basic plan cannot call this API endpoint.

member.name: M:isRock.LineBot.Bot.GetNumberOfSentBroadcastMessages(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Gets the number of messages sent with the /bot/message/broadcast endpoint. The number of messages retrieved by this operation does not include the number of messages sent from LINE Official Account Manager.

member.name: M:isRock.LineBot.Bot.GetNumberOfMessageDeliveries(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns the number of messages sent on a specified day.
member.param: Date for which to retrieve number of sent messages (UTC+0)

member.name: M:isRock.LineBot.Bot.GetNumberOfFollowers(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns the number of users who have added the bot on or before a specified date.
member.param: Date for which to retrieve the number of followers.(UTC +0)

member.name: M:isRock.LineBot.Bot.GetFriendDemographics
member.summary: Retrieves the demographic attributes for a bot's friends. In addition, you can check the information of friends only for LINE official accounts created by users in Japan (JP), Thailand (TH) and Taiwan (TW).

member.name: M:isRock.LineBot.Bot.GetGroupSummary(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the group ID, group name, and group icon URL of a group where the LINE Official Account is a member.

member.name: M:isRock.LineBot.Bot.GetMembersInGroupCount(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the count of members in a group. You can get the member in group count even if the user hasn't added the LINE Official Account as a friend or has blocked the LINE Official Account.

member.name: M:isRock.LineBot.Bot.GetMembersInRoomCount(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the count of members in a room. You can get the member in room count even if the user hasn't added the LINE Official Account as a friend or has blocked the LINE Official Account.

members.member:
主動傳送圖片訊息
用戶UID(注意並非Line用戶id) 要傳送的訊息 /// 要傳送的訊息 ChannelAccessToken

主動傳送貼圖訊息
用戶UID(注意並非Line用戶id) packageId /// stickerId ChannelAccessToken

主動傳送ButtonsTemplate Message
用戶UID(注意並非Line用戶id) packageId /// stickerId ChannelAccessToken

用戶UID(注意並非Line用戶id) packageId /// stickerId ChannelAccessToken

member.name: M:isRock.LineLoginV21.Utility.GetFriendshipStatus(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the friendship status of the user and the bot linked to your LINE Login channel. Note: Requires an access token with the profile scope.For more information, see Making an authorization request and Scopes. Note: You must have a bot linked with your channel.For more information, see Linking a bot with your LINE Login channel.
